mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_ngc_data t left join t_ccs_user u on u.f_account_number=t.account_number left join t_ngc_factory a on a.id=u.factory
and ( t.account_number =#{account_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (flag1='0' and t.account_number =#{account_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (flag2='0' )
and ( t.template_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and t.create_time >= CONCAT( #{begindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ' 00:00:00')
and t.create_time <= CONCAT( #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ' 23:59:59')
and ( a.name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and ( fileNumber LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and ( u.username LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))

SELECT t.id, t.account_number, t.template_name, t.create_time, t.filenumber ,t.flag1,t.flag2,t.task_id from t_ngc_data t left join t_ccs_user u on u.f_account_number=t.account_number left join t_ngc_factory a on a.id=u.factory
and ( t.account_number =#{account_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (flag1='0' and t.account_number =#{account_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (flag2='0' )
and ( t.template_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and t.create_time >= CONCAT( #{begindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ' 00:00:00')
and t.create_time <= CONCAT( #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ' 23:59:59')
and ( a.name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and ( fileNumber LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and ( u.username LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
order by id desc limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id FROM t_ngc_data WHERE filenumber = #{fileNumber}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_ngc_data WHERE filenumber = #{fileNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ngc_data set create_time=#{createTime}, task_id=#{taskId}, flag2=#{flag2}, account_number = #{accountNumber}, template_name = #{templateName} WHERE filenumber = #{fileNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM t_ngc_data d left join t_ccs_user u on d.account_number=u.F_ACCOUNT_NUMBER where u.f_account_number=#{f_account_number}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_ngc_data d left join t_ccs_user u on d.account_number=u.F_ACCOUNT_NUMBER where u.f_account_number=#{f_account_number} and flag2='0' and flag1='0'
SELECT count(1) FROM t_ngc_data d left join t_ccs_user u on d.account_number=u.F_ACCOUNT_NUMBER where u.f_account_number=#{f_account_number} and flag1='0'
SELECT count(1) FROM t_ngc_data d left join t_ccs_user u on d.account_number=u.F_ACCOUNT_NUMBER where u.f_account_number=#{f_account_number} and create_time like CONCAT('%', #{month}, '%')
